{"id":1066204755,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1696361779,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1066204755/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Value of an Ordered Triplet I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumTripletValue(vector<int>& nums) {\n        long long ans=0,a=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-2;i++){\n            for(int j=i+1;j<nums.size()-1;j++){\n                for(int k=j+1;k<nums.size();k++){\n                    a=(nums[i] - nums[j]) * nums[k];\n                    ans= max(a,ans);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-value-of-an-ordered-triplet-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
